description:
Subaru finds himself in a maid café with two very familiar maids serving him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 3 - Goshujin-sama to, Sono Maid-tachi
